presets.name: PsycheTrip Echo Pad
presets.summary: Lush and hypnotic tones built on swirling modulation and ambient trails. Designed for layered atmospheres and expressive solos.

presets.name: Modern Psychedelic Glow
presets.summary: Bright, shimmering tone with spacious modulation and filtered textures. Perfect for modern psych-pop grooves and dreamy riffs.
